casebody.data:
LEROY K. HARRIS v. COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION (AC 24657)

Dranginis, Flynn and McLachlan, Js.

Submitted on briefs October 27 officially released November 16, 2004 Per Curiam.

The habeas court did not abuse its discretion in denying the petition for certification to appeal from the dismissal of the habeas petition.

The appeal is dismissed.
